headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  DOLAN, THOMAS GERARD

snippet: DOLAN--Thomas Gerard, 51, beloved husband of Carrie Sklarin Dolan and devoted son of Dorothy V. Dolan, died suddenly on April 19, 2016. He is also survived by his loving brothers, Michael and Christopher. A Memorial Mass will be held at Saint Paul the Apostle Church at Columbus Avenue and 60th Street at 10am on May 14, 2016. In lieu of flowers, the family would appreciate donations to The Hydrocephalus Association, c/o Andrea Moore, 5 Stonewall Rd., Rockville Center, NY. 1/3
lead_paragraph: DOLAN--Thomas Gerard, 51, beloved husband of Carrie Sklarin Dolan and devoted son of Dorothy V. Dolan, died suddenly on April 19, 2016. In lieu of flowers, the family would appreciate donations to The Hydrocephalus Association, c/o Andrea Moore, 5 Stonewall Rd., Rockville Center, NY. 1/3
